title: Mobile-Based Formative Assessment Utilization for Enhancing Teaching Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language education theories and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning in PC-unavailable environments, with the goal of developing practical pedagogical methods applicable to language education settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their teaching methods using a self-diagnosis tool for the four dimensions of instructional quality (organization, assessment & feedback, personal interaction, academic rigor)
Learners can develop and implement a plan to improve instructional strategies based on formative assessment results
Learners can derive specific instructional improvement points through interpretation of assessment results using the Wright Map

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
